General.Name: Shanghai Prisemi Electronics Co Ltd
General.Description: Shanghai Prisemi Electronics Co.,Ltd., a high-tech electronics company, researches and develops, produces, and sells power ICs and power devices in China. The company offers power ICs, such as charge ICs, over voltage protection, audio power amplifiers, GaN ICs, DC-DC power management, etc.; and power devices comprising transient voltage suppression diodes, metal-oxide semiconductor field effect transistors, Schottky barrier diode, TSS, Zener diode, GaN HEMT, transistors, etc. It also offers battery chargers, DC-DC converters, load switch, GDT, switch diode, J FET, bridge, and PTC. The company's products are primarily used in various applications, including consumer electronics, network communication equipment, security monitoring systems, industry, etc. It also exports its products to Hong Kong, Taiwan, South Korea, etc. The company was founded in 2009 and is based in Shanghai, China.
General.Address: No. 7, Lane 2277, Zuchong Road, Shanghai, China, 201210
